divs: Sighting Details1.. outside front yard..2... ive had 2 other sighting last 9 days ..i looked to my right saw dis..3....not a plane..or jet..to many fly over my house i can tell night or day with or with out a contrailwheatger or not its a plane....4....white disc size of basketball moved to my left made a very hard horseshoe turn left and it dissappeared...5....i actualy feel very calm when i see these objects.. it just vanished gone..what the heck is happening here in ellicott city????...
Summary: white disc. moving east then very sharp horse shoe turn to left toa westrly direction.
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Ellicott City
There was one other sighting in Ellicott City on or around November 3rd 2013
